website_summaries.verdict: Charming and educational, this tea set uses music and role-play to make learning fun.
pros: Feature rich design that teaches counting, colors, and introduces social skills and manners
A variety of songs, sounds, and lights keep playtime interesting
Chunky construction is easy for little fingers to handle
cons: Very much geared toward girls, although boys who manage to get their hands on it will probably love it too!

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Favorite Gift for One Year Old Granddaughter!!
customer_reviews.text: One yr old granddaughter LOVED this so much. She was dancing and singing with the tea kettle before we could even get it out of the box!! Very well made. Bright colors, lights, songs and sound effects. HIGHLY recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Gramma H

customer_reviews.title: Daughter LOVES this.
customer_reviews.text: Best gift you can get a 1 year old. My daughter got this when she was one, and I've gifted to several little ones since because it's probably her favorite toy overall and she's almost 2 now. When other kids come over, even 4 and 5 year olds, they gravitate right to the teapot and the cake. It's really cute. Here and there we hide toys and get them back out reintroducing them to our daughter and when we do it with this, she'll play with this for over a week straight when she sees it again.
customer_reviews.author: AHS

customer_reviews.title: Tea and music for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: My dollar stretched far on this one! I bought this as a birthday present for my daughter when she turned 8 years old. It is such a hit in my household. My older daughter, who is 17 years old, dances to the music as the eight-year-old pours the tea. Several times a week my ten-year-old daughter will also join in and the three of them will have a big Tea Party. Complete with lights and sounds. It is a great toy for them all to grow up with. I am surprised to see that many people bought this for younger children too.
customer_reviews.author: dogmom

customer_reviews.title: Fun and educational Tea Party Toy Set
customer_reviews.text: First of all, when the delivered box was handed off at my front door, the power switch was apparently in "ON" position because a lilting voice was offering "a little cup of tea!". That was charming; I'm sure all mail carriers got a kick from that. I forwarded this to my granddaughter for a 1st birthday gift, and that's a little young. But my son & daughter-in-law say it's enjoyed by all of them: colorful, durable, voice and sound effects (gurgling water sounds in pot) appropriate for a tea party. Tea pot voices references to the different colors and fruits depicted on each of the 6 cake slices - educational and promotes hand-eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Nearlynarly

customer_reviews.title: Tea Party Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tea set for my two year old daughter and she has a blast with it. The tea cup talks and sings and encourages color matching. The tea in the kettle appears to rock back in forth like it has liquid inside. You can lift the lid and see reflection. You also press the heart to refill the tea. My daughter's favorite feature is the pouring sound it makes when you pour the tea into a cup. I love the colored slices of pie as she learns her colors. Highly recommend for toddlers who love to make believe.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Tea party time!
customer_reviews.text: My twins who are two absolutely love this set. They are always asking for their cake and we get to learn different fruits and colors. The tea pot can become rather annoying after a while but that's why batteries are removable lol
customer_reviews.author: @influenstermom

customer_reviews.title: Great Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute tea set. I am glad I chose this over the Fisher Price brand. It's similar but this one is cuter in my opinion. The cake pieces are a great size for toddler hands. This is a very educational toy with fun songs and education about colors, counting, and manners.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun little musical teapot.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for your little girl or boy! The teapot makes little girgling sounds when you tip it over and plays music too. I bought this for my granddaughter's first birthday and she's still playing with it. Also bought one as a gift for a friend's daughter and she loved it, too. One caution though ... make sure it's turned off before you wrap it, if giving as a gift. We didn't' realize it was turned on when we wrapped it and it started singing when we drove to the party! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Photo Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great interactive pretend play for toddlers. Very safe and sturdy toy parts. My 14 months old granddaughter enjoys very much.
customer_reviews.author: 4Seas7Winds

customer_reviews.title: Fun & educational
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter loves this tea set! It lights up and teaches manners, colors, addition etc. we love leap frog toys because they are fun yet educational. She loved when she opened the top and there was a mirror there! What a surprise. There is a switch to control the volume which was much needed. Grab this for the little girl in your life
customer_reviews.author: Black_GirlMagic405

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids from 1-8!
customer_reviews.text: My cousin bought this for her 1 1/2 year old as a Christmas present. Not only does she play with it, so does her 3 year old, her 7 year old, and my 8 year old!!! The tea pot is interactive and is a delight for the kids to play with. The cake is really just painted plastic slices of pie, but for some reason the kids are addicted to feeding us cake and singing happy birthday to each other as it gets passed around. I can't express how much fun all 4 kids have had with this tea set.
customer_reviews.author: daniGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the price
customer_reviews.text: What a fun little set! My friend's daughter has this (her daughter is 2 yrs old) and we played "tea" with it for quite a while. I was even entertained! I then decided to order this for my niece for her birthday (turning 1 yr old). Sturdy and held up no problem with getting knocked around a bit. Animated and nice volume options. My friends daughter would follow the instructions when the pot was empty and match up the cake pieces with the color of the "tea". I think my niece will be able to enjoy this set for a while.
customer_reviews.author: MN Nice

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cute tea set for a 2 year old. This is such a cute little set!! The volume is great, but too loud. It helps the little ones learn colors and counting. For example, it will say “pour two cups of tea” and then will count. Or it will say “pick the blue piece of cake”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even for boys!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this tea set. He is just 2 years old and I got it for him for Christmas. He enjoys pouring tea for his grandparents and his parents. He enjoys opening and closing the lid and listening to all the sounds. He even runs to the sink and puts his cups in when they are 'dirty.' My only wish is to have more cups. And I don't know why there are holes in the cups....I understand it isn't a real tea set, but it may be nice to put water or something in eventually.... Well worth the purchase. He alternates between his Thomas trains and pouring tea.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Interactive/Imaginative Toy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and a lot of fun! We gave this to our daughter for her first birthday. She would pretend her other toys were cups so we thought it would be cute to get her a tea set and this was the perfect one! She likes to bring us the cups and share the cake so it’s a good toy for interactive play together. The songs are cute and catchy and have not got annoying like some other electronic toys get. The button may have been difficult for her to push at 1 year but she’s 16 months now and can push it without a problem. I’d highly recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for a little lady
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. It glows plays music. She wants to have a tea party all the time. Awesome gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I love Leap Frog products!
customer_reviews.text: My great granddaughter loves this! The colors are bright, the pieces are perfect for her little hands. There is an on/off switch for the music. And also a volume control. The songs are cute and the sayings are numerous. When you tip the teapot to pour it makes a noise like water is pouring into the teacup. So cute! The cake pieces are the perfect size so as not to go all the way into a kid's mouth. Only drawback...6 pieces of cake and only 2 teacups.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Cashin

customer_reviews.title: The songs and voice aren't to annoying and colors are attractive especially to a little one
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 yr old son loves this so much. I was worried about getting it for him because it's marketed for 1-3 and he is almost over that but he wakes up every morning, comes out, makes me a cup of tea with cake. It was very worth it for us. He loves that he can pour and it makes the water sound. The songs and voice aren't to annoying and colors are attractive especially to a little one. I do wish there were little saucers for the cake but then that would be 2 more pieces to keep track of.
customer_reviews.author: WJML

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this tea set. I like the realism of the tea in the pot moving about and also the music and colors. The ONLY gripe I have is that when they packaged it, they poked holes in the teacups to attach them to the box. I wish they would’ve attached them somehow that would not put holes in the cups, it really ruins the aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdmom15

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Little Girls
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters have all learned about tea parties. This little set is great for toddlers just learning the ropes. I sent it to my granddaughter for her birthday and she loved it. It plays a little song.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kohler Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loved This
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this tea set. She loved the colors and sounds and liked pouring it. We had plenty of tea parties with this set so far. Seems to be very durable and it was definitely easy for her to handle by herself (ie: the buttons are kid friendly).
customer_reviews.author: Micksdad

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for two year olds for Christmas. Both girls loved the teapot and especially liked hearing the whistling noise, associated with a regular tea pot. I was not disappointed and highly recommend this product. The little girl's moms told me their daughters could not put it away. Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Leapfrog Musical Tea Party Set for my grand-daughter, for her 2nd birthday. She loves it!! It was the best gift that I could have gotten for her. She loves all of the lights and sounds. Every time I go to her house she runs to get this set, and she offers me tea and cake. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Revaerd

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a 2 yr old. Pot talks....has pouring sounds....tells you to pour some more...and tells you when (supposedly) the pot is empty. The pot then tells you what to press and the pot will then have a water filling sound...along with a light on the pot that shows a (supposed) filled pot. Absolutely adorable!!!
customer_reviews.author: CB in Nh

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 1/2 year old granddaughter many months ago. We live quite a distance away from each other so I only get to see her a few times a year. Imagine my delight when the first toy she picked out of her toy chest for us to play with was the LeapFrog Musical Tea Set. Seeing a child still play with a toy she has had for almost a year now really lets me know the toy was worth the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got the tea pot itself as a worn down hand me down from someone else. I decided I wanted to give her the whole set this year and was glad that I was able to find it because she loves the tea pot. It arrived promptly with no damage. I can't wait to give it to her for her birthday/Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, like any toddler, has a VERY short attention span. I’m so surprised to see how much fun she can have with this thing. She literally runs to her tiny coffee table every morning as soon as she wakes up. I did a lot of research before deciding on this one and I definitely recommend to everyone looking for a fun, educational, pretend play-encouraging tea set. You will be singing along in no time :)
customer_reviews.author: palindromes

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 1st great granddaughter she is now 4 and is one of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1st great granddaughter she is now 4 and is one of her favorite go to toy when she visits us. She loves to make her grandpapa teas and feed him cake. I just bought another set for my 2nd great granddaughter who is almost 2 so she could take it home with her to Fla she loved it too Great toy and can learn colors and numbers and sharing
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Wrena

customer_reviews.title: When in doubt, pinkies out...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1-year-old daughter’s favorite toy! Mommy loves having tea with her too! It’s a bonus that it also teaches her colors and cute little songs. Not sure why there’s 2 holes in the cups though? I would’ve liked to have the option of actually pouring a little water in the cup to teach her how to drink from a cup, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Enright

customer_reviews.title: BEST tea set EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT tea set for toddlers and preschoolers. We had lots of different tea sets, but the bubbling sound of the teapot, the wonderful changing colors of the teapot and the vivid colors of the cakes make this VERY popular with my granddaughters fro 12 months to 4 years old. They never tired of playing with this tea set.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Much prefer this to the Fisher Price counterpart.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tea set - I definitely prefer it to the Fisher Price set. The songs are fun and sound is clear and it is an engaging toy for our kids (girls between a year and a year and a half have played with it). Plus it feeds their vanity with a little mirror in the top of the teapot which leads to lots of giggles when it's opened. I would say kids between 1-3 years would enjoy this toy most and in various ways - it will work great for actual sit down tea parties when our girls are a bit older.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Loud and annoying
customer_reviews.text: This was so loud and annoying! I returned it. It kind of does too much. You can't just pour a cup of fake tea. It wants to sing, do colors, and it just talks and talks and talks!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this tea set
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves to play with this tea set every day. Of course one of the cake slices disappeared already and the baby ignores the spoken directions. But she loves the pouring sound effects when she pours a cup and knows when to push the button to brew another pot.
customer_reviews.author: chizu131

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Someone at the distribution center must have put the switch to on, because every time anyone moved the package it would talk tea time? I switched it to off when I received it. I sure hope the batteries last awhile? Anyway, I’m not to happy with your distribution center.
customer_reviews.author: Merle Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece for Christmas. My sister said she plays with it everyday and carries it around with her. She will be 2 in May so she was about 19 months at time of gifting if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: The toy is great but we got defective one
customer_reviews.text: the product itself is awesome but we got oyrs defective. The button for sound control is not quite working, it works only on higest level, on lower it gives no sign of life. Bummer cause we like the toy, its justtoo loud. I had a feeling like the toy had been opened but ou well.. the way the toys are packed today you need a tool box to open them so returning was impossible due to ruined original packaging. i wish i ordered from toys r us, never had issues there.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: My daughter plays with this often
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play with at my in laws house and my daughter loves it. She is 18 months old and has been using it for several months now. She has not gotten bored with it and still asks to play with it often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little girls loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters sister in law is VERY PARTICULAR but her little girls loved this tea set! When she reminded them who i am she said. You know she gave you the tea set!!! Thats when you know a gift was a hit
customer_reviews.author: Pminor

customer_reviews.title: Children were not very interested in playing with it
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4.5 year old and a two year old and this toy did not hold their attention for more then 20 mins the first day and they have shown no interest in it for over two weeks. It’s just not interesting to them. It’s a cute toy but I do prefer more educational, non plastic toys
customer_reviews.author: ashley murdoch

customer_reviews.title: Great pretend toy!
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun with my 2 and 1/2 year old niece! Got it as a gift for a trip and we had so much fun! She learned to pretend to serve tea and cakes, to share and socialize together while "drinking tea and eating cakes". We played games with colors, learned new words together. Great toy! She loves the songs that come from the tea pot. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: toddler granddaughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves having tea parties with this set. It sounds like its really pouring when you turn it on its side. Its a great learning tool too. it asks you to put a specific piece of dessert on the plate or pour a certain number of cups. Really a cute, fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Cute and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2yr old child and it was fun enough to engage him and his cousin for 2 days. He obsessed with pouring tea and it helped him learn sharing. He still plays with it occasionally, but all in all a good toy that he can play with friends during play dates
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful light up toy that was easy to use, and pretty durable.
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit with my two year old granddaughter. I can’t tell you how many cups of ‘tea’ I drank the day I gave it to her. Easy to use for little hands, too. And I could see the sideways glances her four year old sister was giving the glowing teapot. Well, that’s one war Grandma won’t have to settle ;-))
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: CUTE!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and sounds like a wonderful gift. I can only find one flaw and that is that the package shrink wrap or packaging is half off. I can repair and will. Its our great granddaughters first birthday gift and I believe she will treasure and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Takes punishment!
customer_reviews.text: One of my girls favorite toys to freak out over and fight over which is nice, I suppose it does help in some aspect with the sharing though the real positive is not that but rather that this toy takes a serious beating and has not had a issue what so ever and I'm a bit surprised because other LeapFrog toys simple die after to much punishment. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M Carolin

customer_reviews.title: Cutest tea set
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute toy, and the songs are catchy too! Both of my daughters love this little tea set. This is actually the second one we've purchased because the first one was misplaced and pieces missing. It has a volume control switch as well. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyAndHusband

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best toy ever! My son loves the music the tea pot and it helps with colors, counting and coordination. He can put all 8 pieces on the plate in the right direction to form a circle (he couldn't originally) and he will pick me up the orange or pink piece when I ask him for it (using please obviously) and he loves pouring me a cup of tea. I would definitely recommend this as a gift for any child. Hours of fun and entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: LindS

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it and it is very well made.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this tea set all the time. It was relatively inexpensive and it is made really well. As she pours it the "liquid" goes down in the teapot and it makes sounds like pouring, the cups and cake are also really well made. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Myron TTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and cute tea set!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old baby girl loves music and dances whenever she hears it so I thought she would love this tea set. She really does! The price was great for everything it includes. My son sits and plays with this set too which makes his baby sister so happy. I definitely recommend it especially if your little one enjoys lights, colors, music and other sounds!
customer_reviews.author: lovemykids05Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2-year-old niece and she loved it! I like that it has several pieces to the set, but that the pieces aren't too small to get lost. My niece especially liked the music feature, and I like that her older 5-year-old brother will play with her.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: A Spot of Tea to Make your LIttle One Smile
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute little first tea set. My granddaughter, now 11 months, has been playing with the tea kettle for the past couple months. She's not quite ready to serve tea and cakes so the cakes just get tossed around but I am sure in time we will have many tea parties together.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie K

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old girl twin loved this set. It was a Christmas gift that I don't regret. We will continue to use this as she gets older to learn colors and imaginary play. Shipped fast the only thing I'd mention to the seller is the on/off button was on so it arrived talking to me through the box. Lol. Thank you. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Angle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 yr old granddaughter for her birthday. She loves it! The singing teaches colors and counting and matching. Nice noises of gurgling water when you tip it and when the 'tea' is ready it whistles like a real teapot.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Perry

customer_reviews.title: Family loves this! Made well-- good job leap frog!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves love this! So does my nephew! The songs and voice of the woman singing and speaking is different, and it's actually a relief lol. It's a lower pitch than most kids toys, you know that "fake optimistic- I normally don't talk like this voice". This ones great! The songs, the games, the interaction are great, they did a good job with programming it. The colors are cute, the cakes are adorable and it really makes them interact and Share!!! Would recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tea pot voice is very easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: Our grand daughter loves this toy, she is a toddler so she drops it on the floor quite a bit and it has never broke. Very durable. The tea pot voice is very easy to understand, her voice is very clear. Very nice toy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The Post Office had a good laugh when they got it singing away
customer_reviews.text: The little Teapot sang all the way to me. The Post Office had a good laugh when they got it singing away. The switch was left on while in transit. The Teapot and other items are so cute. I think the little G-G-Daughter will have lots of fun playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn F. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The toy is of great quality and very colorful. When you press the heart button in the middle the tea brews and plays a song. It will then tell you what flavor tea it is brewing Once you tip the tea pot is make a sound of tea being poured and tell you how many more cups you have to fill. Once it is all empty it will tell you to brew another pot. The little cakes can then be matched with which flavor tea is being brewed. On the side you have an on/off switch and volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Davis

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved this tea set and my two year old is ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this tea set and my two year old is over the top happy.... as soon as she say it on her birthday she wanted me to take it out of the box .... she holds the cake on the tray and offers slices to her favourite people it is so adorable..... I am quiet pleased and satisfied with this purchase couldn't ask for anything better well worth the money i spent for it
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Bel

customer_reviews.title: VERY, VERY CUTE! A must-buy for every little girl!
customer_reviews.text: ADORABLE set! My 2 year old granddaughter is still enjoying this set from last Christmas! High quality, nicely made toy! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be a great way to have a tea party with my 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm personally a bit of a tea fanatic so when I saw this, I thought it would be a great way to have a tea party with my 2 and 4 year old cousins. And they LOVE it. They don't really pay attention to the education aspect of it, but they love the water pouring sound when they tilt the pot. They also love to serve the cake with a butter knife and force everyone to pretend eat it all day. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe G.

customer_reviews.title: Super Happy w Interactive Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for 1 yr old grand daughter. She loved it!! Her 3 year old sister was excited as well! The 1 yr old likes the lights and music, but the 3 yr old will be challenged w counting cups of tea served etc. Lots of interaction w this TeaPot. I wish it had more cups, other than that I recommend hiighly!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute little toy
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little toy I purchased for my 2 year old niece. The teapot can sense when it is being tipped to act like it pours and the light shows the level the pretend water is at. There is no inside of the teapot. When you lift the lid all there is a little toy plastic mirror on the inside. The little cups and pie pieces do not make any noise or light up or anything. They are cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little tea pot. Purchased as a Christmas gift for my two year old daughter. She has been playing with it since unwrapping it. That to me alone makes the purchase worth it. Great size for little hands. Love the learning concepts it offers. I am a fan of LeapFrog and have noticed that the few items from the brand we do have are among my daughters favorites. I would definitely recommend. Fun for boys and girls!
customer_reviews.author: T. Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any toddler...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a few years ago for my then 1 year old and she is still playing with it today. It has survived many falls and tantrums with no scratches and the music plays just the same. It's super cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Zimmy

customer_reviews.title: That she uses it and likes it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar product for my older granddaughter 10 yrs ago. I taught her about tea parties. My 1 yes granddaughter is now playing pretend tea party on her own with her baby dolls. Too cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find! Fantastic for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This has been keeping my toddler very busy, it's very interactive, sings along and gives you instructions on when tea is ready, even has real pouring sounds and changes colors depending on the flavor cake and tea (all plastic very durable).
customer_reviews.author: Azeema Aroon

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Little Girls' Toy!!
customer_reviews.text: Our grand niece loves this toy! It was packaged wonderfully, and it arrived to us perfectly. The price was a little below toy stores I checked and with the shipping it was comparable. Saved me a trip to the toy store! I'm very pleased and happy with my purchase. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill Barbary

customer_reviews.title: A sweet and well made little item!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute and educational toy. I gave this to my 2 year old granddaughter and she has learned her colors as well as manners! it's sturdy and even when it drops to the floor, it continues to work. Very well made! Can't ask for more than THAT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea party accessory
customer_reviews.text: This tea set is a must for anyone looking. My daughter just love it & so do I. The little cake slices are adorable. The tea pot lights up & makes all kinds of noises like pouring a cup of tea, sings songs, and tells you when the pot of tea is low. It's so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ufers

customer_reviews.title: Good for conversational skills and sharing
customer_reviews.text: My 17 months daughter LOVES playing with the teacups and keeps on pouring and pouring some more. Of course there has to be a playmate with her (aka me) to encourage her more. I sit with her alongside the picnic basket that I got (same company; different toy) and we would enjoy our tea/picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Deejay

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for little kids
customer_reviews.text: This toy is very cool. It has music and sound effect. Very appealing to young kids. I bought this for a on ed year old girl, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cool buyer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Educational
customer_reviews.text: I gave his to my daughter for her first birthday. She got excited about it as soon as she unwrapped it. I think it's a toy she will enjoy for awhile. My 3 year old friends daughter loved playing with it too. I like that it is educational teaching colors, counting, and matching.
customer_reviews.author: Kay H.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute toy. I would say it's a classic. Purchased for a 2 year old girl. Keeps her busy all day. It's one of her favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter had a previous tea set and I wasn't happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a previous tea set and I wasn't happy with it. I wanted one that sounded like tea was pouring every time it was tipped. This one does just that!!!! I am so excited with this product. It even looks like tea is inside. My daughter plays with this one way more! The cakes are adorable too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: john raymond

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved this gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a 2 year olds birthday. It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: SaraBaroo

customer_reviews.title: Very cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is enjoying her new toy. The only thing that I am questioning is, when the toy arrived, as I was opening the package, the toy started singing and making sounds. Why would it be shipped in the "on" position, using up the battery life? Every time the box was moved in shipment, the toy was activated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even Grandpa Joined the Tea Party!
customer_reviews.text: This made a much enjoyed and appreciated gift for a two year old. Enjoyed and appreciated by both the kids and the adults. Well made. Lots of variety in play. Subtly educational.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dearing

customer_reviews.title: Still used daily after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's first birthday and she loved it right away. She is now 19 months and uses this several times daily. We have gotten so much use out of this and it's super durable. We also have the LeapFrog picnic basket which is used just as much. Great products!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Moore

customer_reviews.title: Came in a very good condition and with batteries
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Came in a very good condition and with batteries. Sender didnt turn off the toy so I received it in a box making noises so I had to open it, turn it off and then wrap it. Overall it's a very good toy for 2 year old girl
customer_reviews.author: Chellie L.

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect tea set for a little girl
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect tea set for a little girl. I bought one for my granddaughter several years ago and it’s one of her favorite things. I purchased this one for our great niece. Great product that will bring years of enjoyment
customer_reviews.author: Sy

customer_reviews.title: Great teapot/cup set!
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year-old daughters loves this set. She loves the pouring sound it makes when she tilts the pot, and it teaches her colors and counting. Really glad we got it!
customer_reviews.author: taychelle

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: Received package today. It came with 4 defective triple A batteries. Removed and added new batteries. Didn’t work. Not worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: Filipg22

customer_reviews.title: Toddler must have
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my little girl for Christmas and it was the favorite gift by far! She was mesmerized from the first moment. It sings cute little songs and makes fun bubbling noises when you pour out the tea. Her big brother even plays with it! It’s a win!
customer_reviews.author: Barbary

customer_reviews.title: Very friendly toy for play acting for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun toy for a toddler. My 22 month old granddaughter loves pouring tea and handing it out to family members. She serves the "cake" and really acts through the "ceremony." The tea pot sings, talks and instructs, while she pours tea. She loves this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Lochaber25

customer_reviews.title: Tea set
customer_reviews.text: It is a cute toy. Very durable and the sound is adjustable but I get tired of picking up all of the pieces of cake. The kids seem to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Gemuend

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: We have had this toy since Christmas of last year and my granddaughter has had many happy hours playing with it. The teapot is cute and sings cute little songs. The toy is sturdy and had held up really good to a 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Tea Time Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This teapot is a hit with my 3yo granddaughter. Her older sisters and even I have poured a cup or two just to hear the fun sound it makes. She also loves the cake slices that came with it. She's not lacking other toys at my house, but she seeks this one out every time.
customer_reviews.author: jelo

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter absolutely loves this set! The percolating and pouring sounds are very realistic. She loves playing with it with and without the sound and it doesn’t take much room to store. Also teaches about flavors and colors.
customer_reviews.author: MileHighSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 15 month old for Christmas and he loves it. It’s one of the few toys he keeps going back to. We love playing tea time as a family.
customer_reviews.author: do288

customer_reviews.title: It was so annoying I returned it
customer_reviews.text: Cute but really noisy. It has no off switch. It was so annoying I returned it. When handing it to the postal clerk it started doing it's thing. He's says - what the heck, I said - exactly, that's why it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Great tea set for my daughter. My daughter loves to pretend eat,drink, and cook. I would recommend if you're child likes to pretend eat and drink, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Wootz

customer_reviews.title: Hit with 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Took her a few days to figure out the actions, but she plays with it nearly every day.
customer_reviews.author: FcommaQ

customer_reviews.title: A great first birthday present
customer_reviews.text: It is SO cute- I have bought it as a gift for several friends' children, including my own niece on her 1st birthday. The lights are cute and the sound of tea being brewed and poured is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very cute for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, only problem is it kinda goes on and on. I bought for a friend's daughter and the package kept going off. I think the 2 year old will love it though. It sings a ton of songs, and the lights move when you pour like there is real water in the pot. Makes a water pouring noise when you tip the pot. Reminds me of the Fisher Price one but does more. I'd recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Tea Time Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable toy! Bought for my 2 year old granddaughter and she loves it! and I never enjoyed imaginary tea parties, so much! Also, seems to be durable. ( have had a few drops and it still worked!)
customer_reviews.author: Michel Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to "drink" lots of tea!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this set and I think the songs are really cute. It's impressive because the "tea level" that lights up changes depending on how many "pours" are made. Very cute set :)
customer_reviews.author: luckyinkentucky

customer_reviews.title: Musical tea set
customer_reviews.text: This little musical tea set is a Christmas gift for my 1 year old niece. It appears to be nice materials, feels nice and is so colorful and adorable. I will return with my full review after it is opened and played with.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: 3&1/2 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade from her handmedown teapot with a single tea cup, & she adores it. Tea parties are constant, with me & with her other toys. The cakes are a really fun addition. & I was so pleased that it came with batteries! The songs & light effects are delightful, & my daughter enjoys playing along with the games. Decent price, DEFINITELY worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this! Out of all the Xmas gifts she played with this the most! Teaches colors and counting and sings songs
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous toy!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy! My two year old granddaughter was thrilled. She loves to play with her tea set!! It lights up and plays music. So cool!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Betzen
